column1: Baby Barnaby's////We started out with the OJ which is so fresh that I might as well have ordered the whole orange
column5: and french toast. The tacos were unbelievably cheesy (so me!) and tasted extra fresh
column6: the french toast is packed with flavor from different spices like nutmeg (you can smell it)
column7: making it more than just egg washed toast
column8: and the waffle was beyond words.
